Leon please move to T206.  thanks!
Hi, is it a PSA 3 or 3.5? Thanks, very nice set

Pic corrected.  It's a 3.5

Thanks John for pointing that out.

AJ, I am very confused - and I ask bc I have been watching your Cobb Sov 350 and I almost asked the same question.  I am almost positive there was a picture of a PSA 3 and your description said 3.5. Rather than changing the description to jive with the pic that was up there, there is now a pic of a 3.5 - I am sure it is the same card, just maybe a changed flip? Please clarify, did you used to have a pic up of that Cobb in a PSA 3 and now it shows 3.5, and if so, how?  Your reply seems to imply that was the case and that is my recollection.  Just trying to understand as someone who was interested in the card.

Ryan
Hey Ryan yes I got a .5 bump during a review.  I accidentally posted old photo.  Thanks for asking
Got it. That makes sense. Thanks. Very nice card. I may circle up with you after the weekend (and auctions have ended) if the Cobb is still available.
Nice buy for someone. Had my eye on that red portrait ;)
If the person who bought the Cobb Bat Off is looking to sell, please contact me :p
I don't even have it in hand yet!!! Vultures!!!!
